column4: hey i lspci says ihave " VGA compatible controller: VIA Technologies, Inc. K8M890 [Chrome9] Integrated Video (rev 01)" as a video card, is there a way to get compiz-fusion working?
ddi yo try to enable the effects in menu > sustem > prefs > appearance ?
: yes but it says desktop effects cannot be enabled or something to that effect
try asking in #compiz-fusion if your card is strong enough, itmight not be,  the isntaller usualy adds compiz if the hardware can handle it
